application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 18 x Leyland Cypress (applicants ref. G12) - Prune from adjacent structure to clear building by 1.5m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. 90 x Sycamore , 30 x Horse Chestnut, 5 x Silver Birch, 10 x Hornbeam, 60 x Hawthorn, 175 x Ash, 100 x Holly, 30 x Cherry, 100 x Willow, 20 x Elder, 50 x Yew (applicants ref. G15) - Prune from adjacent structure to clear buildings on neighbouring land by at least 2m, to North and south of group. Standing in Area A1 and Group G23 of Tree Preservation Order.45 x Sycamore, 30 x Hornbeam, 25 x Hawthorn, 50 x Ash, 30 x Holly, 200 x Black Walnut, 40 x Cherry Laurel, 30 x Willow, 35 x Elder, 6 x Yew, 15 x Lime (applicants ref. G41) - Prune from adjacent structure to clear all buildings by at least 2.5m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T1055) - End-weight reduction - Specified extent of 3m on subordinate limb over school grounds, due to suspected weak fork union to main trunk. Work will reduce extension growth and loading on this stem. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x English Oak (applicants ref. T1105) - Remove suspended or broken limb/limbs in crown over roof at approximately 13m, assess point of failure for decay and reduce limbs attached by upto 2m if necessary. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Crack Willow (applicants ref. T24986) - Pollard - Initiate new regime to height of 3m to manage tree size in consideration of lean onto field, and remove deteriorated upper crown. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T27861) - Fell. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Unrecognised (applicants ref. T27868) - Fell. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (Exempt works)1 x Elm (applicants ref. T27871) - Fell. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (Exempt works)1 x Ash (applicants ref. T27872) - Fell. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
